newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NZ's Powerco on track for NZ$17 mln full-yr profit.
newsitem.headline: NZ's Powerco on track for NZ$17 mln full-yr profit.

text.p: New Zealand electricity company Powerco Ltd on Thursday reported a net profit of NZ$10.4 million for the six months to September 30 and said it was on track for a forecast record full-year profit of $17 million.
Powerco was reporting on the first six months of trading following the merger between Powerco Wanganui and Taranaki Energy.

"We are confident that the financial targets we set at the time of the merger will be exceeded and we will achieve a tax-paid result fo the full year of a record $17 million," Chairman Barry Upson said.
He said a key factor in the strong interim result was a 14 percent saving in operating costs.
